prompts.title: Research Synthesizer
prompts.summary: Generate comprehensive yet concise summaries by synthesizing credible sources and highlighting research gaps

prompts.title: Topic Outliner
prompts.summary: Generate structured outlines for blog posts, articles, or lessons with narrative flow and engagement elements

prompts.title: Lesson Planner
prompts.summary: Draft structured lesson plans aligned with learning objectives, curriculum standards, and time constraints

prompts.title: Pedagogy Advisor
prompts.summary: Recommend teaching strategies and classroom techniques tailored to topic, audience, and context

prompts.title: Learning Objective Refiner
prompts.summary: Analyze and refine learning objectives to ensure they are SMART and aligned with Bloom's taxonomy

prompts.title: Content Evaluator
prompts.summary: Review draft content to assess clarity, structure, readability, and inclusivity with actionable feedback

prompts.title: Engagement Strategist
prompts.summary: Suggest techniques to captivate readers or learners and foster community around educational content

prompts.title: Inclusive Language Checker
prompts.summary: Assess text for inclusive language and accessibility, providing suggestions to improve inclusivity

prompts.title: SEO Enhancer
prompts.summary: Provide guidance on optimizing educational content for search engines without sacrificing clarity

prompts.title: Multimedia & Interactive Designer
prompts.summary: Recommend multimedia and interactive elements to enhance comprehension and engagement

prompts.title: Audience Understanding Survey
prompts.summary: Design surveys to understand audience interests, needs, and backgrounds for content tailoring

prompts.title: Student Feedback Collector
prompts.summary: Generate plans for collecting and analyzing student feedback on lessons or educational content

prompts.title: Reflection Prompter
prompts.summary: Generate reflective questions to encourage authors or educators to improve their work

prompts.title: Content Calendar Planner
prompts.summary: Create publication schedules for educational content across channels to maintain consistency

prompts.title: Citation & Credibility Validator
prompts.summary: Check claims are supported by credible sources and citations follow appropriate standards

prompts.title: Resource Summarizer
prompts.summary: Compile curated lists of educational tools and resources with summaries and licensing information

prompts.title: Curriculum Alignment Checker
prompts.summary: Evaluate lesson plans for alignment with curriculum standards and frameworks

prompts.title: Assessment Designer
prompts.summary: Design formative or summative assessments tailored to learning objectives with fair evaluation

prompts.title: Gamified Learning Challenge Designer
prompts.summary: Create game-like challenges to enhance motivation and learning through competition and engagement

prompts.title: Accessibility Auditor
prompts.summary: Evaluate educational content for accessibility compliance and inclusivity with actionable recommendations

prompts.title: Social Media Booster
prompts.summary: Advise on promoting educational content through social media channels to broaden reach

prompts.title: Community Builder
prompts.summary: Help creators cultivate engaged learning communities around their content or platform

prompts.title: Podcast & Webinar Advisor
prompts.summary: Guide educators in planning and producing audio or video content with format and promotion advice

prompts.title: Data Visualization Suggestor
prompts.summary: Recommend appropriate charts and visualizations to represent data in educational content

prompts.title: Responsive Design Consultant
prompts.summary: Advise on designing educational websites to be mobile-friendly and accessible on various devices

prompts.title: Peer Review Coordinator
prompts.summary: Facilitate peer review of educational content by organizing reviewers and collecting feedback

prompts.title: Source Finder & Summarizer
prompts.summary: Identify credible sources and summarize their main arguments to support evidence-based content

prompts.title: Standards & Compliance Checker
prompts.summary: Assess content adherence to institutional, national, or international guidelines and policies

prompts.title: Student Feedback Analyzer
prompts.summary: Process and interpret collected student feedback to uncover themes and actionable insights

prompts.title: Content Recycling Planner
prompts.summary: Identify opportunities to repurpose existing content into new formats or for different audiences

prompts.title: Ethics & Privacy Guard
prompts.summary: Provide guidance on ethical considerations and privacy when creating educational content

prompts.title: Publication Format Advisor
prompts.summary: Help authors choose the most suitable format for their content with pros, cons, and adaptation steps

prompts.title: Writing Style & Tone Coach
prompts.summary: Provide feedback and guidance on writing style and tone to match intended audience and context

prompts.title: Idea Brainstormer
prompts.summary: Generate ideas for future blog posts, lessons, or educational projects based on themes and trends

prompts.title: Audience Personalizer
prompts.summary: Tailor content recommendations to different audience segments by adjusting examples and tone

prompts.title: Trend Watcher
prompts.summary: Monitor emerging trends in education, technology, and society that could influence content topics
